attributes.action: conduct an urgent reform of the way the BBC is funded and administered.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent and highly publicized events surrounding the BBC's inconsistent and uneven handling of offensive and inappropriately broadcast material (viz. Messrs. Bale, Ross & Jupitus and Mses. Thatcher & Brand), is it not high time the Government stepped in and reformed the way the BBC is run ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
